thread.title: Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling are in New Zealand together, and it’s the BFF duo we didn’t know we needed
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling are in New Zealand together, and it’s the BFF duo we didn’t know we needed

author: Johnni Macke
title: Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling are in New Zealand together, and it’s the BFF duo we didn’t know we needed
text:
Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling are in New Zealand together, and it’s the BFF duo we didn’t know we needed We love it when we accidentally discover a new Hollywood friendship, because today we found out that actresses Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling are in New Zealand together! Their journey to the land down under together is the BFF pairing we didn’t know we needed.
The two actresses are set to star in Disney’s A Wrinkle in Time , so their traveling is actually for work. Despite the fact that they had to get together to film in New Zealand, they didn’t have to go on the same flight, but luckily they did.
Witherspoon and Kaling’s friendship is one of the more secret friendships in Hollywood, but we love it just the same. The first time we really saw it was when Kaling created “Wreath Witherspoon” on her TV show, The Mindy Project . It is a Christmas wreath with pictures of Reese and it’s awesome.
She later donned a tee from one of Witherspoon’s Draper James collections . Oh, and then Witherspoon approved of the TV wreath and read Kaling’s book ! Now they are showing off their real-life friendship in a tropical destination and we’re all for it.
“I am headed here for work and I could not be more excited. I even rewatched Lord of the Rings as a primer. I usually play characters that work in American offices so this is big change!,” The Mindy Project star captioned her travel photo. “Plus so much stellar comedy from here. Any lovely Kiwis out there have recommendations for me? Your country is so beautiful and I am lucky to be able to go. #travel #newzealand #anIndianGirlinNZ.” I am headed here for work and I could not be more excited. I even rewatched Lord of Rings as a primer. I usually play characters that work in American offices so this is big change! Plus so much stellar comedy from here. Any lovely Kiwis out there have recommendations for me? Your country is so beautiful and I am lucky to be able to go. #travel #newzealand #anIndianGirlinNZ 
A photo posted by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 9, 2017 at 10:46am PST 
The Wild actress then commented on her photo saying, “I can’t wait to explore NZ with you!!”
Witherspoon posted her own pre-travel picture before linking up with the 37-year-old actress .
“I’m off to #NewZealand!!! My first visit ever…What should I do?…Where should I go?…Did I pack too much???? ✈️ #HereWeGo #NZBound,” Witherspoon wrote.
I’m off to #NewZealand!!! My first visit ever ... What should I do? ... Where should I go? ... Did I pack too much???? ✈️ #HereWeGo #NZBound 
A photo posted by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 10, 2017 at 2:43pm PST 
Then the two shared their first BFF photo from the trip after stopping in Hawaii to stretch their legs. “Wahine. Aloha Maui!,” Kaling captioned the photo on Friday.
Wahine. Aloha Maui! 
A photo posted by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 10, 2017 at 8:50pm PST 
Once they touched down in the land down under, the Louisiana native shared a cute selfie with her co-star and bestie.
“Watch out New Zealand! We’re h rrrree & Ready to : 1. Hike these mtns 2. Snuggle some sheep 3. Meet awesome Kiwis,” she wrote on the fun photo. Watch out New Zealand! We're h rrrree & Ready to : 1. Hike these mtns 2. Snuggle some sheep 3. Meet awesome Kiwis 
A photo posted by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 12, 2017 at 5:39pm PST 
Even though the two are dealing with MAJOR jetlag, the actresses have found time to photograph their beautiful surroundings. Wanaka, South Island, NZ 
A photo posted by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 12, 2017 at 1:09pm PST 
Oh, and play with horses.
My new bf ❤️ 
A photo posted by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 11, 2017 at 1:01pm PST 
We’re loving these two together. Now we can’t wait to see them on the big screen side by side!
